headline: Are Pepsi Shares Attractive After a 5.5% Drop in the Past Year?
summary: Curious whether PepsiCo is a steal, fairly priced, or overpriced at the moment? You are not alone, and there are plenty of opinions out there about what its shares are really worth today. PepsiCo stock has moved very little in the last week (up 0.6%), lost 3.0% over the past month, and is still down 5.5% over the past year, even as the broader index has shifted. Some of this movement comes as investors react to sector trends. For example, recent shifts in consumer staples sentiment and...
